column1: President Trump coming to Arizona during coronavirus pandemic https://www.azcentral.com/story/news/politics/arizona/2020/04/29/trump-leave-white-house-amid-coronavirus-visit-arizona/3052520001/ via @azcentral Terrific, we need this disease in Arizona. Of course, the ignorant Trumpanzees (including Ducey, Biggs, Lesko, Gosar, McSally Schweikert) will be thrilled.
